options.name: Minor Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Beginner Spells from the Druidic or Geomancy schools of magic.

options.name: Tunneler
options.description: Gain a Burrow Speed equal to your Movement Speed.

options.name: The Language of the Earth
options.description: You gain the Okkor Language and gain +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Action [Daily] : Elemental Form
options.description: You take the form of an Earth Sprite, gaining it's stat block for 1 minute or until you reach 0 Health. At Level 5, this ability improves, allowing you to take the form of an Earth Elementaling instead. At Level 9, you can take the form of an Earth Elemental

options.name: Lesser Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Novice Spells from the Druidic or Geomancy schools of magic.

options.name: Geocrystals
options.description: Your connection to the Plane of Okkor has manifested on crystal-like growths on your body that facilitate magic. Gain +10 Power and +10 Power Regeneration.

options.name: Action : Geowave
options.description: You make a Melee Attack against the ground, causing a wave of energy striking any creature within 2 units with a Force Attack. Any Huge or smaller creature who fails the check falls prone and takes Physical Damage equal to your level.

options.name: Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Journeyman Spells from the Druidic or Geomancy schools of magic.

options.name: Okkor's Binding
options.description: When crafting weapons or armor, you can add an additional infusion. Additionally, weapons you craft gain the Magical trait and armor you craft gains +1 Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Gift of Nature
options.description: You touch another creature, granting them 3 Physical and 3 Elemental Mitigation for an hour. This effect is doubled on beasts.

options.name: Greater Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Expert Spells from the Druidic or Geomancy schools of magic. At level 10, learn 2 Master Spells from the Druidic or Geomancy schools of magic. Additionally, gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: Action : Solid as Stone
options.description: You take the Defend Action and gain Physical and Arcane Mitigation equal to your Level until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Okkor Connection
options.description: You have a connection with the Plane of Okkor, or one of it's adjacent planes, manifesting in minor or major changes to your appearance.
